'''''Into the Depths''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Chasmlighter]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock all [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in [[The Chasm (Area)|The Chasm]] and its [[Underground Mines]].
